name: touchscreen-handy.de News
author: Frank Kugler

sections.description:
Adds a customizeable widget which displays the latest news by http://www.touchscreen-handy.de/

Feature List

  • customizable widget
  • displays a user-defined number of links
  • title shortening
sections.installation:
1. Extract touchscreen-handyde-news.zip.
  2. Upload the touchscreen-handyde-news-folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.

German
a. Entpacke touchscreen-handyde-news.zip. b. Lade den touchscreen-handyde-news-Ordner in dein Verzeichnis /wp-content/plugins hoch. c. Aktiviere das Plugin im ‘Plugins’-Menü der WordPress-Administration. d. Füge das Widget unter Design->Widgets deiner Sidebar hinzu und bearbeite die Widget-Optionen.
